Summary: Something was flying over downtown Saint Paul on Oct 27, 2008
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in St Paul
There were no other sightings in St Paul on or around October 27th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsToday October 27, 2008 ��������� I was on my 2:30ish break at work and I walk the stairs up to the 13th floor on my way down I was looking out the window which over looks the midway which is the distance between Minneapolis and Saint Paul, and Downtown St Paul is off in the distance. St Paul has an airport so I thought I saw a plain taking off from the airport and that the sun was hitting the plain funny because it didn���������t really look like a plain. I stood there watching it, not thinking it was anything but a plain taking off heading east. As it was taking off it hovered, a bit, thinking it was just because of the distance I continued to watch, then it move off course and started to head west, it looked like it was still over downtown St Paul when it turned south and disappeared behind a building, I stood there for as long as I could but it never reappeared and I had to go back to work. I wished so much that I had my camera phone with me to take a picture of this object. I am not sure what I saw, it was a bright reflective light moving in a very odd way.
